Name: Helper Cat
About the game: Helper cat is a puzzle game, in which your objective is to help a magician, putting his potions in the correct places, but for that you'll have to face all the puzzles in the castle. 25 levels, challenging 25 Steam achievements Simple and intuitive game play 3 different mechanics Enchanting soundtrack Pixel art 1bit
